headline: TKO Group Holdings to Participate in UBS Global Media & Communications Conference
summary: NEW YORK, November 25, 2024--TKO Group Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: TKO), a premium sports and sports entertainment company, announced that its President and Chief Operating Officer, Mark Shapiro, will participate in the UBS Global Media & Communications Conference on Monday, December 9, 2024 at 11:15 a.m. Eastern Time in New York, NY.
